column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2022

column6: Really versatile and flattering colors! (Color descriptions in review below)
column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2022
column14: I am in my 50s, with light yellow-toned skin and auburn hair. I found all but one of these shades to be extremely flattering and wearable. I wasn’t sure what to expect since Clinique has a reputation for offering somewhat dated and overly frosty colors. But they’ve clearly worked on their lipstick range. These shades are gorgeous!
